https://tmrev.io/movie/597853-Donbass. Borderland 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/5oAgi4kMFCOWT6cjv0DGMATeGYl.jpg In the center of the plot of the film is a young soldier of the Ukrainian army, Andrei Sokolov, who is sent to the combat zone as a driver. Fleeing from the shelling, Andrew finds himself in the basement of a dwelling house, where he meets different people, each of whom dreams of only one thing - so that the war will end as soon as possible. Donbass. Borderland
